name: Dive-Bomb 3
desc: At start of combat, if both unit's and foe's HP ≥ 80% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.
inherit: Cannot use: InfantryArmoredCavalryRed BowRed DaggerRed TomeBlue BowBlue DaggerBlue TomeGreen BowGreen DaggerGreen TomeColorless BowColorless DaggerColorless TomeColorless Staff
